full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BSTAN BSRUNG DAM CAN GAR BA RDO RJE LEGS PA'I SGRUB THABS SROG DBANG RJES GNANG BYA TSUL MTHU STOBS DNGOS GRUB CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES RGYAL BA'I BSTAN BSRUNG DAM CAN MGA' BA RDO RJE LEGS PA'I SGRUB THABS SROG DBANG RJES GNANG BYA TSUL MTHU STOBS DNGOS GRUB CHAR 'BEBS ZHES PA 'DI YANG, MDO SNGAGS DBANG LUNG 'DZIN RGYUD SMAD LHA RAM PA BSKAL BZANG CHOS 'PHEL LAGS NANG BSKUL NGOR, KUN GZIGS LNGA PA, PAn CHEN SKU 'PHRENG GONG 'OG ,RTZA BA'I BLA MA SRAS PO RTA TSAG GONG MA RJE BTZUN 'GYUR MED RDO RJE SOGS KYI GSUNG LA ZHIB TU RTAGS TE @005A *, ,DAM CAN RVA ZHON SENG ZHON BCAS KYI SROG GTAD RJES GNANG CHA TSANG THOS PA'I GYI NA BA HOR BSKAL BZANG SKYE MING PAS 'BRAS SPUNGS CHOS SDE SA BYI ZLA TSES BZANG POR SUG BRIS BGYIS PA DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
